subtitle: This potato dish is satisfying on its own or with steamed vegetables. Also good served with roast and grilled meats.

method.text: Peel and slice potatoes. Cook in boiling water for about 6 min. Drain, rinse in cold water and drain again.
Roll out pastry. Cut 6 x 12 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub> cm and 6 x 15cm circles. Lay the 12.5cm circles on a greased baking sheet. Arrange the potato slices in layers on the pastry.
Season each layer. Sprinkle with a little crushed garlic and cheese, finishing with a layer of cheese.
Use the remaining pastry circles to make lids. Make a hole in the top of each pie for the steam to escape. Glaze with beaten egg and sprinkle with seeds.
Bake for 20-25 min or until well-risen and golden brown.

title: Lancashire pot
